settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Lowered Cancer Risk
settings.text: Countless studies suggest that soy consumption can cause hormonal imbalances which, in turn, can increase the risk of certain cancers. Fortunately, when you dine with Table & Twine, you don’t have to worry about any of these issues.

settings.title: Improved Health
settings.text: Our soy-free meal kits are also free of other food triggers like added sugar, artificial flavors, and preservatives. This allows you to enjoy a restaurant-quality meal that’s not only delicious and convenient but also healthy.

settings.title: Fun, Fresh Flavors
settings.text: Unlike some meal providers, we don’t store bulk ingredients in warehouses for months. Instead, our chefs partner with local growers to select the freshest produce and proteins possible.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose a Soy-Free Meal Kit?
settings.text: Our soy-free options give you the convenience of a meal delivery service but with the bold flavors and artful preparation of a Michelin Star restaurant. Other benefits of Table & Twine’s soy-free meal kits include:

100% Soy-Free Food: Our chefs want you to enjoy a decadent meal with confidence. That’s why they take the time to select ingredients that are 100% soy-free. Soy-free meals are also prepared separately from other meals to avoid cross-contamination.

Meals Ready for Finishing: When you partner with Table & Twine, you’re never alone in the kitchen. After handling the more technical aspects of cooking for you, our chefs will guide you through the rest with step-by-step heating instructions.

Flavorful Meals: Choosing our meal kits gives you the just-made freshness that restaurant take-out cannot match. Plus, since you do 10% of the cooking yourself, you receive the satisfaction of pulling off a five-star meal.

Delicious Pairings: To provide you with a truly personalized culinary experience, our chefs develop side dishes and dessert pairings for every soy-free entrée. From soups to tarts, we have thought of it all.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: What To Expect From Our Soy-Free Meal Service
settings.text2: When you order a soy-free prepared dinner from Table & Twine, you can expect a meal that is fresh, innovative, and delicious.

settings.title: Is a soy-free diet healthier?
settings.text: If you have a soy allergy or sensitivity, eliminating soy products from your diet can alleviate uncomfortable symptoms like rashes and digestive upset.

settings.title: Should I avoid soy even if I don’t have an intolerance?
settings.text: Even if you haven’t been formally diagnosed with a soy sensitivity, you may benefit from our soy-free meal kit in Charleston. Why? Because these meals are free of other unwanted products like added sugars and preservatives.

settings.title: What comes in a Table & Twine soy-free meal kit?
settings.text: Your soy-free meal kit contains all the ingredients you need to make a restaurant-quality dinner.

settings.title: Will I benefit from a soy-free meal kit?
settings.text: Definitely! It can be challenging to follow a specific diet. Luckily, Table & Twine is here to provide you with healthy recipes that can be prepared in 15 minutes or less.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
